tests.name: Complex multi-mode editing with navigation
tests.input:
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
Python is a powerful programming language.
Vim is an excellent text editor.
Coding requires practice and patience.
This is line number five with some text.
tests.commands: 5gg3wciWFINAL<Esc>0AAdded at end.<Esc>gg2j^3Ei(inserted)<Esc>G$5hRREPLACED<Esc>3gg0ISTART: <Esc>w5lr!2kJ010la and more<Esc>ggoNew line below first<Esc>2jONew line above third<Esc>
